Package com.boatcorp.boatgame.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        • com.boatcorp.boatgame.entities.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable
    public class Player
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
    Creates a Player object which holds relevant data such as position and health, as well as allowing the user to control the playable ship. In assessment 2, some features which have been added are Power ups and difficulty - USR22.
